directions: Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add turkey; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes. Add tomato sauce, water, green chile peppers, onion, taco seasoning, and garlic; simmer, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 30 minutes.
Spoon turkey mixture over tortillas. Top with lettuce, Cheddar cheese, tomatoes, green onion, cilantro, and sliced olives.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers
1 cup shredded lettuce, or to taste
1/2 cup Cheddar cheese, or to taste
1/2 cup diced tomatoes, or to taste
1/4 cup chopped green onion, or to taste
1/4 cup chopped cilantro, or to taste
2 tablespoons sliced olives, or to taste
title: Tasty Ground Turkey Tacos
